name: bit7z
description: A C++ static library offering a clean and simple interface to the 7-zip shared libraries

auto-prefix-long-paths.description: Enable automatically prepend paths with Windows long path prefix

regex-matching.description: Enable regex matching of archived files

use-native-string.description: Enable using the OS native string type (e.g., std::wstring on Windows, std::string elsewhere)

use-std-byte.description: Enable using type safe byte type (like std::byte) for buffers
